title: DDFP: Playoff Pro-shek-tions
itunes:title: DDFP: Playoff Pro-shek-tions
description:
Dave and Adam go game-by-game to talk a little playoff football and predict a Super matchup in Indy, then welcome in NFL.com blogger extraordinaire Dan Hanzus to discuss the dreaded "Sanchize" label and the Jets' dysfunctions. Along the way, the guys talk a little college football, the Steelers-Ravens "rivalry," and rank the greats to proudly sport the number 44 upon their backs. Take a listen, won't you?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
